summary: Adds a new craftable outfit to Skyrim designed for Butlers/Stewards
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new outfit to Skyrim which is that of a Butler/Steward, Proventus Avenicci now wears the clothes. They are marked as clothes and are craftable at a tanning rack.

I hope you enjoy, if so feel free to endorse.

Permissions: You may not upload this file to other sites.
You may not use the assets of this file in your own mods without my permission.
You may not improve upon my mod are release bug fixes without my permission, other than HD retextures that only include the textures not the meshes used.

Credits: Bethesda for this great game and modding kit.
Most importantly the team who created NIF skope!
author: JDcrafter
